alert.note: Alert for Orange; Seminole; Southern Lake County (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Freeze Watch issued December 25 at 3:00AM EST until December 26 at 8:00AM EST by NWS Melbourne
info.description: ...FREEZE WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM EST THIS MORNING... ...FREEZE WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT THROUGH MONDAY MORNING... * WHAT...For the Freeze Warning early this morning, duration of freezing temperatures between 2 and 6 hours expected. For the Freeze Watch late tonight, near freezing temperatures of 32 degrees possible. * WHERE...Orange, Seminole and Southern Lake Counties. * WHEN...For the Freeze Warning, until 9 AM EST this morning. For the Freeze Watch, from late tonight through Monday morning. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. Bring pets and potted plants indoors. Check on elderly neighbors to make sure their furnace is working.To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they can be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly.
